mapper.insert: INSERT INTO seckill (product_id, shop_id, state, seckill_num, product_price, seckill_price, product_tile, product_name, seckill_inventory, version, start_time, end_time, create_time) VALUES (#{productId}, #{shopId}, #{state}, #{seckillNum}, #{productPrice}, #{seckillPrice}, #{productTile}, #{productName}, #{seckillInventory}, 1, #{startTime}, #{endTime}, current_timestamp )
mapper.select: SELECT id, product_id productId, shop_id shopId, state, seckill_num seckillNum, product_price productPrice, product_tile productTile, product_name productName, seckill_price seckillPrice, seckill_inventory seckillInventory, version, start_time startTime, end_time endTime, create_time createTime, approve_time approveTime FROM seckill

SELECT id, product_id productId, shop_id shopId, state, seckill_num seckillNum, product_price productPrice, product_tile productTile, product_name productName, seckill_price seckillPrice, seckill_inventory seckillInventory, version, start_time startTime, end_time endTime, create_time createTime, approve_time approveTime FROM seckill WHERE id = #{id} LIMIT 1

SELECT id, product_id productId, shop_id shopId, state, seckill_num seckillNum, product_price productPrice, product_tile productTile, product_name productName, seckill_price seckillPrice, seckill_inventory seckillInventory, version, start_time startTime, end_time endTime, create_time createTime, approve_time approveTime FROM seckill WHERE id = #{id} LIMIT 1 FOR UPDATE
